pages.text: $(o)If you are having a lot of trouble finding Villages, or more villagers, you can post up some Help Wanted signs!

pages.title: Villager Post
pages.text: $(o)Put up a Villager Post around the houses you've built for your new villagers (you HAVE built houses for them, right?!). And then wait until morning. $(br2)Each morning, you have a chance of a Villager showing up, ready to move in and join your village.

pages.title: Enticing Villagers
pages.text: $(o)If you want to all but guarantee a Villager will show up, place an Emerald, Gold, or Diamond block next to the sign!
